detailsOfAchievement: raaga a Group of Young Theatre Practitioners, Writers, Designer, Musicians and Visual & Fine Art Artist, was Formed in 2007. In the age of Multidisciplinary and Multicultural world raaga aims is to collaborate with young & enthusiastic artist of varied field, Kinds and nature to come together, So that the sonorous amalgam could happen resulting a fine tune art work and practices which is the need of our modern but disturb society. As a nation state, we are at the critical junction, where the opposite has become the common feature in walk of life. We are at the helm of political, social, religious, regional and ethnic contamination and contractions regularly into violence in various part of the country. We as a group, raaga are firm that only cultural interaction between all this fractions of the society can lead us to a harmonious society and nation state. Facing various challenging of our time, our art practice should not be aloof of the difficulties of our time. Our art practice will try to intrigue, converse and communicate with the people in their language and so we will be using the popular forms of the country heavily. We hope that the young and energetic artist of the country with their own modernist approach will create a huge different in the contemporary art practice scenario with hug investment of peoples culture. The rest would be the history. Akkarmashi is a First production of raaga.
